original_text: or the sin which he has committed is made known to him, he shall bring for his offering a goat, a female without blemish, for his sin which he has committed.
korean_text: 그가 범한 죄를 누가 그에게 깨우쳐 주면 그는 흠 없는 암염소를 끌고 와서 그 범한 죄로 말미암아 그것을 예물로 삼아

sentences.original_text: or the sin which he has committed is made known to him
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그가 지은 죄가 그에게 알려지면

sentences.original_text: he shall bring for his offering a goat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기의 제물로 염소 한 마리를 가져올지니라

sentences.original_text: for his sin which he has committed
